meanings.definition: A group of peptides that cause vasoconstriction and a rise in blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The angiotensins play a role in increasing blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study angiotensins to understand their impact on blood pressure regulation.
meanings.sent3: The angiotensins decided to throw a party and invite all the blood vessels.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the angiotensins, tightening their grip on the situation.
meanings.sent5: The angiotensins are like little traffic controllers, directing the flow of blood through the body.

meanings.definition: Any of several polypeptides that are involved in the control of blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating the different types of angiotensins present in the body.
meanings.sent2: Angiotensins are crucial for maintaining a healthy blood pressure level.
meanings.sent3: The angiotensins had a meeting to discuss their strategies for managing blood pressure.
meanings.sent4: His influence on the team was like that of the angiotensins, guiding them towards success.
meanings.sent5: In the body, angiotensins act like tiny regulators, ensuring blood pressure stays in check.
